Event.Message: The Link Layer Discovery Protocol driver (LLDP) is starting
The Link Layer Discovery Protocol driver (LLDP) is stopping
The interface %1 is enabled
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="IfIndex" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: The interface %1 is disabled
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="IfIndex" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: The local MIB on interface %1 has been updated
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="IfIndex" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: An update to the local MIB on interface %1 was rejected
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="IfIndex" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="RejectReason" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: The parameter %2 on interface %1 has been changed
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="IfIndex" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="AdminParameter" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="OldValue" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="NewValue" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: An LLDP frame was transmitted on interface %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="IfIndex" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="PacketPayloadLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="PacketPayload" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="PacketPayloadLength"/> </template>

Event.Message: An LLDP frame was received on interface %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="IfIndex" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="SequenceNumber" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="PacketPayloadLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="PacketPayload" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="PacketPayloadLength"/> </template>

Event.Message: An LLDP frame received on interface %1 was rejected. %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="IfIndex" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="SequenceNumber" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="PacketDiscardReason" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: An LLDP frame was successfully validated on interface %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="IfIndex" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="SequenceNumber" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: A new neighbor was discovered on interface %1 Neighbor ID: %3
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="IfIndex" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="MsapIdLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="MsapId" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="MsapIdLength"/> </template>

Event.Message: The neighbor on interface %1 has updated its MIB Neighbor ID: %3
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="IfIndex" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="MsapIdLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="MsapId" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="MsapIdLength"/> </template>

Event.Message: The neighbor on interface %1 was removed because no message has been received within the timeout interval Neighbor ID: %3
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="IfIndex" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="MsapIdLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="MsapId" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="MsapIdLength"/> </template>

Event.Message: The neighbor on interface %1 was removed because a shutdown message was received Neighbor ID: %3
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="IfIndex" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="MsapIdLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="MsapId" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="MsapIdLength"/> </template>

Event.Message: The system has detected that there are multiple neighbors sending LLDP packets to the network interface %1. A "tooManyNeighbors" state has been declared. This may inhibit some network operations.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="IfIndex" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: The "tooManyNeighbors" state has been cleared
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="IfIndex" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: A message was received on interface %1 from an unknown neighbor, while the previously-detected neighbor is still active. This will prolong the "tooManyNeighbors" state. Existing Neighbor ID: %3 Recived Neighbor ID: %5
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="IfIndex" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="ExistingMsapIdLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="ExistingMsapId" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="ExistingMsapIdLength"/> <data name="ReceivedMsapIdLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="ReceivedMsapId" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="ReceivedMsapIdLength"/> </template>

Event.Message: Error: %1 Location: %2 Context: %3
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> <data name="Location" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Context" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Warning: %1 Location: %2 Context: %3
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="WarningCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> <data name="Location" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Context" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Transitioned to State: %1 Context: %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="NextState" inType="win:UInt8" outType="xs:unsignedByte"/> <data name="Context" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Updated Context: %1 Update Reason: %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Context" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="UpdateReasonCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: SourceAddress: %1 SourcePort: %2 DestinationAddress: %3 DestinationPort: %4 Protocol: %5 ReferenceContext: %6
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="SourceAddress" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:IPv4"/> <data name="SourcePort" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="DestinationAddress" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:IPv4"/> <data name="DestinationPort" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Protocol" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="ReferenceContext" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: SourceAddress: %1 SourcePort: %2 DestinationAddress: %3 DestinationPort: %4 Protocol: %5 ReferenceContext: %6
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="SourceAddress" inType="win:Binary" outType="win:IPv6" length="16"/> <data name="SourcePort" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="DestinationAddress" inType="win:Binary" outType="win:IPv6" length="16"/> <data name="DestinationPort" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Protocol" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="ReferenceContext" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Interface Guid: %1 IfIndex: %2 Interface Luid: %3 ReferenceContext: %4
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="IfGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="IfIndex" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="IfLuid" inType="win:UInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="ReferenceContext" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>
